short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables Harvard affiliates to easily gain access to papers through Harvard Library with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using this extension is simple:
Navigate to the journal's website and use one-click to load the page through Harvard Library, or use an article's DOI directly.
